thread.title: Voices: How the Newly Wealthy Should Respond to Requests for Money—Rich Millar
thread.title_full: Voices: How the Newly Wealthy Should Respond to Requests for Money—Rich Millar - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Voices: How the Newly Wealthy Should Respond to Requests for Money—Rich Millar
text:
Rich Millar is a private wealth adviser with Windermere Private Wealth Management, part of Merrill Lynch’s Private Banking and Investment Group in Orlando, Fla. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community.
You may encounter clients who want help managing a large sum of money that they recently acquired, whether they are entrepreneurs who have sold...
